Literature.Title: Acyltransferase that catalyses the condensation of polyketide and peptide moieties of goadvionin hybrid lipopeptides
Literature.Author: Kozakai R, Ono T, Hoshino S, Takahashi HK, Katsuyama Y, Sugai Y, Ozaki T, Teramoto K, Tanaka K, Abe I, Asamizu S, Onaka H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209P JC-1(MIC=6.4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Streptomyces griseus NBRC 13350(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Streptomyces coelicolor A3(2)(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Streptomyces lividans TK23(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Escherichia coli NIHJ JC-2(no activity data)
